statements: UPDATE website_traffic SET conversion_status = TRUE WHERE visitor_id = 123;
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_visited = 'Homepage' WHERE visitor_id = 456;
UPDATE website_traffic SET user_behavior = '{"clicked": true}' WHERE visitor_id = 789;
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_visited = 'Home Page', conversion_status = TRUE WHERE visitor_id = 12345;
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_visited = 'Contact Page', user_behavior = '{"action": "contacted"}' WHERE visitor_id = 54321;
UPDATE website_traffic SET timestamp = '2022-01-20 15:30:00', user_behavior = '{"action": "updated profile"}' WHERE visitor_id = 98765;
UPDATE website_traffic SET traffic_source = 'Organic' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE conversion_rates SET conversion_rate = 0.75 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE website_traffic SET visitor_id = 100 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE website_traffic SET traffic_source = 'Organic' WHERE visitor_id = 100 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE conversion_rates SET conversion_rate = 0.08 WHERE page_id = 5 AND conversion_id = 10;
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_id = 3, traffic_source = 'Paid' WHERE visitor_id IN (200, 201, 202);
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_views = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE conversion_rates SET conversion_rate = 0.05 WHERE goal_name = 'signup';
UPDATE user_behavior SET action = 'login' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_views = page_views + 10 WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE conversion_rates SET conversion_rate = conversion_rate * 1.1 WHERE goal_name = 'signup';
UPDATE user_behavior SET action = 'logged in' WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp > '2022-01-15 10:00:00';
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_views = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE conversion_rates SET conversion_rate = 0.05 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_behavior SET actions = ['click', 'view'] WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_views = page_views + 10 WHERE url = 'example.com';
UPDATE conversion_rates SET conversion_rate = 0.75 WHERE product_id = 123 and date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE user_behavior SET actions = ARRAY['click', 'purchase'] WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE website_visits SET landing_page = 'homepage' WHERE visit_id = 1;
UPDATE conversion_rates SET conversion_value = 50.00 WHERE conversion_id = 1;
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_type = 'click' WHERE behavior_id = 1;
UPDATE website_visits SET landing_page = 'homepage' WHERE user_id = 100 AND visit_id = 1;
UPDATE conversion_rates SET conversion_value = 50.00 WHERE user_id = 200 AND conversion_id = 3;
UPDATE user_profiles SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 300;
